CTR.title: Do you have any questions or inquiries about our services ... You can contact us easily !?

contact-us-form.description: Contact us using the form below, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

contact-us-form.title: Contact Us

max.message: Message must be at most 200 characters

max.phone: Phone must be at most 11 characters

min.message: Message must be at least 10 characters

footer.description: New Horizons for International Trade, "Medi Trade For Trading" was established in 1979, and after 10 years, in July 1989, it became an Egyptian joint stock company specializing in trade and acting as an agent for major international commercial companies.

init-body: Medi Trade Trading Co has been awarded the ISO 9001:2015 certification by ABS Global, confirming its commitment to a world-class quality management system in import, export, and commercial services.
map-title: Medi Trade For Trading... From Egypt to Global Market
placeholder: Find what you’re looking for in the articles...
